name: com.latios.latiosframework
description:
Latios Framework for ECS is a collection of tools, algorithms, and API extensions developed by a hardcore hobbyist game developer.

This package includes all of the following modules:
▪ Core
▪ QVVS Transforms
▪ Psyshock Physics
▪ Myri Audio
▪ Kinemation Animation and Rendering
▪ Caligraphics
▪ LifeFX
▪ Unika

Examples: 
▪ Latios Space Shooter Sample - https://github.com/Dreaming381/lsss-wip 
▪ Mini Demos - https://github.com/Dreaming381/LatiosFrameworkMiniDemos 
▪ Free Parking - https://github.com/Dreaming381/Free-Parking

samples.description: Contains VFX Graph Subgraphs for working with framework-defined types
